name: Out of Space-sploration
description:
This is my 2D Platformer project and includes  Windows and WebGL builds.

Modifications

  • Created 3 levels with varying challenges and unique background graphics
  • Modified the in game menus 
  • Modified the in game and player audio effects

Credits,

Marissa Blacknall

DL-Sounds.com, Mixit.com, opengameart.org: in game audio

https://assetstore.unity.com/: Black Hammer, OArielG, RAFMANIX - in game graphics
